title: enable WebGL
content:
I am trying to upload my picture as an avatar in Gravatar. I keep getting an error message and it won't upload. I read the following message--Please note: If you encounter the error message, “WebGL is not supported or disabled in your browser,” please ensure that the necessary browser settings are enabled.

I'm wondering how I do that.
creator: csosborne004

title: Bookmarks Shortcuts
content: How can I restore my bookmarks and shortcuts. Most of them disappeared earlier today.
creator: Charlie1761

title: Tabs from Previous Session not opening
content:
Despite having the tick in the "Open Tabs and Windows" box, the last 3 days they have not been opened. Instead I get a completely blank page, not even the Firefox home page.

Even the "pinned" tabs aren't opening.

In 20 years I've never had this happen before.
creator: delia

title: tab groups
content: Using tab groups, how to sync those groups across device, like bookmarks are synced ? Currently, I have several groups defined in my account, but they are not synced on my professional PC.
creator: blgl110

title: You keep telling me that the BOM is a non secure website
content: Just stop sending useless warnings about Australian Government Websites. The BOM (Bureau of Meteorology) provides weather information on request. It is a free service and does not require a subscription.
creator: david.walsh.syd

title: right-click brings up  menu, but none of the  choices work
content: the latest update 136.0.3 is broken. When right-clicking an item, none of the choices work (e.g. right-clicking on any word brings up a menu with 'open in new tab' as a choice, but nothing happens)
creator: djn

title: Eye strain in recent Firefox versions
content:
I have noticed that in versions of Firefox newer than ESR 115.7 (and early 120s in the main release channel) I get eye strain while using Firefox. This issue didn't happen with earlier versions of Firefox - at least since the Proton UI changeover. And this issue doesn't exist on other software on my system. I haven't changed my Firefox settings.

As a result of this I haven't been able to update my installation of Firefox. I'd like to try to track down what changed around that time and see if I can find a workaround or possibly submit a bug? Is anyone familiar with graphics related changes that occurred around that time? How might I go about figuring this out? I'd like to keep up with the new features and security updates.
creator: arosenbl

title: restore icons, etc. on Firefox
content: restore original Firefox page with icons to open pages
